item.title: [SBG5][Workflow Management] - Mistral
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 10, 2023, 13:00 - 16:00 UTC

Dec 8, 22:35 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 10/01/2023 13:00 UTC 
End time : 10/01/2023 16:00 UTC 
Service impact : All mistral endpoints of SBG5 will be unreachable for 5 minutes
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will migrate Mistral to a new production platform.

item.title: [Global][Managed Kubernetes Service] - Managed Kubernetes clusters v1.22 delivery disabled
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 9, 2023, 07:00 - 17:00 UTC

Dec 21, 22:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 09/01/2023 08:00 UTC
End time : 09/01/2023 18:00 UTC 
Service impact : Delivery and reset of Managed Kubernetes clusters v1.22 disabled
Ongoing actions : Following our end-of-support policy, the Managed Kubernetes Service team will mark as deprecated the Kubernetes version 1.22. It will no longer be possible to create Managed Kubernetes clusters under the 1.22 version, or to reset existing clusters into this version. For more details, please refer to these documentations:
https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/kubernetes/eos-eol-policies/
https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/kubernetes/kubernetes-plugins-software-versions-reserved-resources/

item.title: [GRA1][Public Cloud] - G133A12 / G133A11
item.description:
Dec 31, 15:16 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 30/12/2022 21:35 UTC 
End timetime : 31/12/2022 15:06 UTC 
Service status: The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : The incident was due to a malfunction with our cooling system.

Dec 31, 15:14 UTC
Update - Start time : 30/12/2022 21:35 UTC 
End timetime : 31/12/2022 15:06 UTC 
Service status: The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : The incident was due to a malfunction with our cooling system.

Dec 31, 01:08 UTC
Update - Update : The servers are still being brought back into service.

Dec 30, 22:28 UTC
Update - Update : Our teams have fixed the problem with our cooling system and are now working to get you back in service as soon as possible.

Dec 30, 21:55 UTC
Identified - Start time : 30/12/2022 21:35 UTC 
Service impact : Some servers are unreachable.
Root cause : The incident was due to a problem with our cooling system.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
